title: Beyond My Dreams
description: For Glory And For Gold...The stately homes and greenswards of England are no more than a pleasant memory for Gavin McLeod, the Earl of Blackwell, sent to Egypt on a secret mission for his King. Though Napoleon's soldiers and spies are everywhere, Gavin hopes to find a pharaoh's tomb rumored to hold untold riches before the French can plunder it. But his quest is fruitless—until an adventurer's beautiful daughter offers to lead him to the treasure he seeks. Though she wears the traditional garb of Egyptian women, Mackenzie Tuggle is a true English rose...and Gavin must have her for his own......Above All, For Her Love.Roughly dressed for a nobleman, with a brooding fire in his dark gaze, Gavin is like no other man Mackenzie has ever known. And though she has promised to guide him through the Valley of Kings—and into the labyrinth of a hidden royal grave—there are many dangers that await them. Yet her wayward heart may prove to be the greatest danger of all, for she cannot resist his bold embrace...or his passionate kisses...
author: Tammy Hilz
